attributes.additional_details:
Parliament or the Government need to take knife crime seriously as there are many people who have had their life taken.

Some criminals involved in knife crime tend to reoffend once released from prison.
attributes.background: Parliament and the Government need to make knife crime into a tougher sentence such as 15 years for carrying a knife or any bladed article and life imprisonment without parole for murder due to knife crime.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase penalties for knife crime offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618505

Increase mandatory minimum sentences for carrying a knife, with no parole: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622234
